requests.name: Look Up a Sale Transaction
requests.description:
Get all of the details on a given sale transaction.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#look-up-a-sale
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>

requests.name: Refund a Sale Transaction
requests.description:
Issues either a full or partial refund of a completed sale.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#refund-a-sale
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>
